mapper.update: update sys_role set role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, role_info = #{roleInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where role_id = #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select role_id, role_name, create_user_id, role_info, create_time, update_time from sys_role

select role_id, role_name, create_user_id, role_info, create_time, update_time from sys_role where 1 = 1
and role_name like concat('%',#{sysRole.roleName},'%')
and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{sysRole.startTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') and DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{sysRole.endTime}, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S')
order by create_time
